verses.verse: When I came<WG2064> to<WG4314> you,<WG5209> brothers,<WG80> I<WG2504> didn't<WG3756> come<WG2064> with<WG2596> excellence<WG5247> of speech<WG3056> or<WG2228> of wisdom,<WG4678> proclaiming<WG2605> to you<WG5213> the testimony<WG3142> of God.<WG2316>

<WG2532> I<WG1473> was<WG1096> with<WG4314> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> weakness,<WG769> <WG2532> in<WG1722> fear,<WG5401> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> much<WG4183> trembling.<WG5156>

<WG2532> My<WG3450> speech<WG3056> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> preaching<WG2782> were not<WG3756> in<WG1722> persuasive<WG3981> words<WG3056> of human<WG442> wisdom,<WG4678> but<WG235> in<WG1722> demonstration<WG585> of the Spirit<WG4151> and<WG2532> of power,<WG1411>
that<WG2443> your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> wouldn't<WG3361> stand<WG5600> in<WG1722> the wisdom<WG4678> of men,<WG444> but<WG235> in<WG1722> the power<WG1411> of God.<WG2316>

We speak<WG2980> wisdom,<WG4678> however,<WG1161> among<WG1722> those<WG3588> who are full grown;<WG5046> yet<WG1161> a wisdom<WG4678> not<WG3756> of this<WG5127> world,<WG165> nor<WG3761> of the rulers<WG758> of this<WG5127> world,<WG165> who<WG3588> are coming to nothing.<WG2673>

But<WG235> we speak<WG2980> God<WG2316>'s wisdom<WG4678> in<WG1722> a mystery,<WG3466> the wisdom that has been hidden,<WG613> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> foreordained<WG4309> before<WG4253> the worlds<WG165> for<WG1519> our<WG2257> glory,<WG1391>

which<WG3739> none<WG3762> of the rulers<WG758> of this<WG5127> world<WG165> has known.<WG1097> For<WG1063> had<WG1487> they known<WG1097> it,<WG4717> they wouldn't <WG3756> have<WG302> crucified<WG4717> the Lord<WG2962> of glory.<WG1391>

But<WG235> as<WG2531> it is written,<WG1125> "Things which an<WG3739> eye<WG3788> didn't<WG3756> see,<WG1492> and<WG2532> <WG3756> an ear<WG3775> didn't<WG3756> hear,<WG191> <WG3756> which<WG2532> didn't<WG3756> enter<WG305> into<WG1909> the heart<WG2588> of man,<WG444> these God<WG2316> has prepared<WG2090> for those<WG3588> who love<WG25> him.<WG846>"

But<WG1161> to us,<WG2254> God<WG2316> revealed<WG601> them through<WG1223> the<WG846> Spirit.<WG4151> For<WG1063> the Spirit<WG4151> searches<WG2045> all things,<WG3956> yes,<WG2532> the deep things<WG899> of God.<WG2316>

For<WG1063> who<WG5101> among men<WG444> knows<WG1492> the things<WG3588> of a man,<WG444> except<WG1487> <WG3361> the spirit<WG4151> of the man,<WG444> which is<WG3588> in<WG1722> him?<WG846> Even<WG2532> so,<WG3779> no one<WG3762> knows<WG1492> the things<WG3588> of God,<WG2316> except<WG1487> <WG3361> God<WG2316>'s Spirit.<WG4151>

But<WG1161> we<WG2249> received,<WG2983> not<WG3756> the spirit<WG4151> of the world,<WG2889> but<WG235> the Spirit<WG4151> which is<WG3588> from<WG1537> God,<WG2316> that<WG2443> we might know<WG1492> the things that<WG3588> were freely given<WG5483> to us<WG2254> by<WG5259> God.<WG2316>

Which things<WG3739> also<WG2532> we speak,<WG2980> not<WG3756> in<WG1722> words<WG3056> which man<WG442>'s wisdom<WG4678> teaches,<WG1318> but<WG235> which<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> teaches,<WG1318> comparing<WG4793> spiritual things<WG4152> with spiritual things.<WG4152>

Now<WG1161> the natural<WG5591> man<WG444> doesn't<WG3756> receive<WG1209> the things<WG3588> of God<WG2316>'s Spirit,<WG4151> for<WG1063> they are<WG2076> foolishness<WG3472> to him,<WG846> and<WG2532> he<WG3756> can't<WG1410> know<WG1097> them,<WG3754> because they are spiritually<WG4153> discerned.<WG350>
But<WG1161> he who<WG3588> is spiritual<WG4152><WG99999> discerns<WG350> all things,<WG3956> and<WG1161> he himself<WG846> is judged<WG350> by<WG5259> no one.<WG3762>

"For<WG1063> who<WG5101> has known<WG1097> the mind<WG3563> of the Lord,<WG2962> that<WG3739> he should instruct<WG4822> him?<WG846>" But<WG1161> we<WG2249> have<WG2192> Christ<WG5547>'s mind.<WG3563>
